<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tumbling Opportunist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6245) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=540" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 183 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6240)

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=2370) or [Tumbling Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6244), and you successfully moved through an enemy’s space.

</column>

---

You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back. You attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) instead of [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) for this check.
